name: iso
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool phone.
Tool description: Full set of cool Telephone validation functions with a coverage of more than a hundred different countries.  Phone Metropolis API can analyse, get location information and parse the content of a given phone number. [This API is under maintenance and is not working properly] 
API description: Retrieves the ISO codes for a given country using the Metropolis API.

country.description: The name of the country for which to get the ISO codes.
